S.FORM: Charlie Beasley nalecuhan i Shawnee, Oklahoma, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Charlie Beasley i 1967 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 7 ku uwac atu silsil 74, namapili' tu nu Cincinnati Royals putiput. 9 bulad 23 demiad, 1945 a mihca, Charlie Beasley, miunduay. (mapatay i 2015 a mihca) namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
